comments.en:
No drivers for the printer itself so just use the HP Laserjet. Works fine. No fuss.
Raju Kuallumkal reports that the manual feed works fine, too.
Postscript option available.
2400 vertical dpi smoothing of some sort?

Consumables/Refills: Toner cartridge. 5000 sheets. A little more then a HP Laserjet.
